name: Mind Bender
description: Currently this is a project that I am testing out the values of what feels good and am looking for some general feedback on what numbers and values seem to be good.  I'll be updating this to include more upgrades along with any additional sections to test out those powers on.  There are only a few values that are hard coded into the game that the player isn't able to modify.  I have some of the story and actual game in mind however I am focusing on getting hard set values along with distances that people can travel and knowing exactly how the player moves.  That is why the entire area is made up of boxes.  I would prefer if each box had numbers on them but I am still a novice when it comes to map design and anything that includes visuals.  On the other had the programming is my strongest area but to save on time and effort there are some template programs such as the menu which was thrown together with little thought besides getting it to work.  Thank you for testing and I hope you can give input on what values you like and how I could improve some sections of the player movement or anything else that I have added.  To make things easier, if you hit the quit button there will be a file that shows up called saveData.save and you can post all of the values from there into the comment section so I may look over it.
